basics.name: Gueter Josmy Faure
basics.label: Computer Vision Researcher
basics.summary: Computer Vision Researcher/Engineer who likes to force machines to understand videos. I am working towards a Ph.D. in Computer Science at the National Taiwan University.

work.name: Google
work.summary: Working on developing core human pose and behavior understanding for Android XR.

work.name: HTC
work.summary: Teaching tiny computers to accurately estimate human poses. This includes hand poses (VR headsets), body poses (vision-based trackers) and facial expressions (avatars).

work.name: Movella
work.summary: Help develop the company's first markerless tracker (Android/iOS app) for monitoring physically challenged patients and assist in their rehabilitation.

work.name: 艾鍗科技
work.summary: Develop computer vision algorithms for resource-constrained hardware (Micro:Bit, SparkFun Edge, Raspberry Pi...). Design Computer vision courses tailored for kids.

education.institution: National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University

awards.title: Master's Thesis Excellence Award
awards.summary: This Award goes to the authors of the best Master's Theses on Artificial Intelligence in Taiwan.

awards.title: ECCV 2022 DeeperAction Challenge
awards.summary: I led the team which placed second. We designed a multimodal action detection framework to accurately detect multiple persons performing multiple overlapping actions.

awards.title: Taiwan AI CUP Honorable Mention
awards.awarder: Ministry of Education, Taiwan (台灣教育部)
awards.summary: Our group submitted one of the best solutions for that year's AI CUP.

publications.name: HERMES: temporal-coHERent long-forM understanding with Episodes and Semantics
publications.summary: Extended our ECCVW paper, BREASE with more datasets and more ablations

publications.name: Bridging Episodes and Semantics: A Novel Framework for Long-Form Video Understanding
publications.summary: Took inspiration from cognitive processes to develop an episodic memory module and a semantic parser to efficiently understand long videos.

publications.name: Holistic Interaction Transformer Network for Action Detection
publications.summary: Develop a model that uses skeleton information to improve Action Detection.

publications.name: Interaction-Aware Prompting for Zero-Shot Spatio-Temporal Action Detection
publications.summary: We propose the first Zero-Shot Spatio-Temporal Action Detection model.

publications.name: Confidence-Aware Anomaly Detection in Human Actions
publications.summary: We propose to use the pose feedback to improve anomaly detection.
